name: Thunder Manifestation
storytext: As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Thunder Manifestation

skills.name: Strifeful Lightning
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] to the opposing character affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124022]</color>. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to the opposing character affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lightning Rod</color>. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)
skills.description: Deals 3 Electro DMG to the opposing character affected by Lightning Rod. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)

skills.name: Thundering Shackles
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG, summons 1 Thundering Shackles.

skills.name: Lightning Probe
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When battle begins, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124021]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When battle begins, create a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lightning Strike Probe</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.description: (Passive) When battle begins, create a Lightning Strike Probe on the opponent's side of the field.
